text: Hi all,  yesterday there was a new release of the boilerplate. My own theme is based on an earlier version. is it possible to update my theme to have the new functionality that is offered by the new release?

hm not sure if there is really "new functionality",  just interested to see if it is possible o merge it with the old one?  this release might not have anything special in it or not, but in the future, cilents might want something that is already in the boilerplate and then it would be good to "update" their theme to the never version

fair. One thing i know they were working on is "ids" in the themes.json file that also tie into what the hubl variables are to reach them. It's not something that is new functionality in the boilerplate, but they did most of the hard work for it.
